attributes.action: One off 4% pay rise for all clinical nurses in the uk...
attributes.additional_details: Recognise the nurses responding to covid 19 caring clinically for patients on the frontline.. going above and beyond as they do everyday..
attributes.background: Immediate pay rise for all nurses

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316307
